text: Arnold Skaaland (January 21, 1925 â€“ March 13, 2007) was an American professional wrestler and manager, He was best known for wrestling and managing with the World Wide Wrestling Federation/World Wrestling Federation. He was nicknamed "The Golden Boy". During his managing career, he managed Bob Backlund, Tony Parisi, Bruno Sammartino and Rick McGraw. He was inducted into the WWF Hall of Fame in 1994 by Bob Backlund. ==Championships== Skaaland held many championships during his professional wrestling career: *Cauliflower Alley Club **Other honoree (1994) *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **He was named "PWI Manager of the Year" in 1978 and 1979. *World Wide Wrestling Federation / World Wrestling Federation **Lifetime Achievement Slammy Award (1997) **WWF Hall of Fame (Class of 1994) **WWWF United States Tag Team Championship (one time) - with Spiros Arion ==Other websites== *Arnold Skaaland's WWE Hall of Fame profile Category:1925 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Arnold Skaaland
